ideal.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: the best or most suitable that something could possibly be
ideal.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: advice on how to reach your ideal weight

an ideal place for a walk

ideal.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: an ideal world, job, system etc is one that you imagine to be perfect, but that is not likely to really exist
ideal.translation[0].definitions[1].exam: In an ideal world there would be no need for a police force.
ideal.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: a principle about what is morally right or a perfect standard that you hope to achieve
ideal.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: the ideal of a free and democratic society
ideal.translation[1].definitions[1].defi: a perfect example of what something should be like
